Title: System.js
Description: System.js provides environment-agnostic abstractions for working with javascript in a style familiar to C# programmers. It includes classes for working with command line tools,  browser DOMs, file I/O, custom event dispatch and for adding declarative method attribution.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
System.js provides environment-agnostic abstractions for working with javascript in a style familiar to C# programmers. It includes classes for working with command line tools, browser DOMs, file I/O, custom event dispatch and for adding declarative method attribution.
